prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small frog with vibrant colors and playful traits.
I want to see a Pokemon inspired by a toad that has a cheerful demeanor and loves to swim.
Generate an image of a frog-like Pokemon with a round body and unique spiral patterns on its belly.
Make a design for a charming amphibious Pokemon that enjoys rain and has a bright green appearance.
Imagine a playful water Pokemon with large eyes and a whimsical antenna, perfect for a fairy tale setting.
Show me a frog Pokemon that is both cute and powerful, emphasizing its aquatic abilities and friendly nature.
Design a Pokemon that combines the features of a toad and a playful spirit, with a lively color scheme.
